General.Name: GEOMEGA RES
General.Description: Geomega Resources Inc. engages in the acquisition, evaluation, and exploration of mining properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for rare earth elements and niobium deposits; and focuses on the extraction and separation of rare earth elements and other metals from its mining properties, and other mining and industrial waste. It owns a 100% interest in the Montviel property comprising 162 mining claims covering an area of approximately 8,998 hectares located at the west of the Cree First Nation of Waswanipi, Northern Quebec. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Boucherville, Canada.
General.Address: 75, de Mortagne Boulevard, Boucherville, QC, Canada, J4B 6Y4
